Title: Three Lives and Only One Death
Actors: Marcello Mastroianni, Anna Galiena, Marisa Paredes, Melvil Poupaud
Plot: Take a walk into the weird world of filmmaker Raul Ruiz as he takes us to Paris for a twisted ride. A man who shares four names and four personalities (which is the real one?) is the link between four different, yet similar, stories involving love, lust, crime, and time.
